title: Project Requirements
text:
This repository uses Quarto for site generation and Python for the example scripts and tests.


Install the Quarto command line tools (version 1.3 or higher). After installation you can render the site locally with:
quarto render



Create a virtual environment and install the Python packages listed in requirements.txt:
python3 -m venv .venv
source .venv/bin/activate
pip install -r requirements.txt
Run tests with:
pytest

title: Style Guide
text:
This project favors straightforward code that respects the developerâ€™s liberty to shape things as needed. Keep contributions clean and minimal.



Stick with simple, readable code over clever one-liners.
Use standard libraries before reaching for external dependencies.
Document your work clearly, but avoid needless bureaucracy.
Consistent indentation with four spaces; no hard tabs.
Embrace contributions that promote self-reliance and minimize mandatory tooling.




Write commit messages that briefly explain what changed and why. Stay focused on substance without fluffy language.
